name: Extreme Prejudice

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Seething Hatred, sneak attack +3d6, studied target class feature.

sections.text: When you succeed at a sneak attack against a creature you selected as the target of your Seething Hatred feat, you use d8s to roll sneak attack damage instead of d6s.
sections.name: Benefits

description: Your hatred of a particular type of creature has honed your killer instinct.
